thought: I will now implement the parameters for the PostgreSQL query action to execute the required SQL query and for the Slack message action to send messages to the #general channel with the query results formatted.
plan: Set the SQL query parameter for action_0 to 'SELECT * FROM bloomberg_articles LIMIT 1;'
Set Slack action parameters to send a text message to channel #general
Ensure Slack message text is extracted from input_data with expression
criticism: Currently, the actions have no parameters set, so they do not perform any operations. Setting parameters is necessary for correct execution.

tool_input.comments: Execute the SQL query to get data from bloomberg_articles table.
